dialog.text: lower third of pic is lake, tree line above lake sky above trees
How tall are the trees? And are they all have similar height?
they get a little higher on the left third of the pic. on the right third there are bigger trees - about a half of the way up the sky
Is there nothing between the trees and the sea? And is the boundary horizontally straight?
there is a sliver of brown land in between the lake and the trees. In the middle third of the picture, the trees are only about a tenth of the height of the entire picture.
How tall are the trees at the right side? And are there clouds on the sky?
on the right the trees reach about halfway up the sky. the water is a combo of water and river - not sea. the sky is blue, with one tiny cloud right in the middle of the sky
What is the combo of water and river? Is there only a patch of water or there are lands that separate water into river?
its just a patchwork of river and water to make it look like a lake. there is moss on top of the lake on the bottom sixth of the picture
There are no option for drawing moss. But for the river, can you describe more about the patchwork? Because water and sea gives the same thing
think like a camouflage pattern of river and water
Are there reflections of the trees on the sea?
yes. the trees in the middle third of the pic are a little lower and the cloud is a lot smaller
Is there only one cloud in the middle? So the sky is bright blue or less blue? Is it sunny?
